RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 1 1M 70Y Turf CR: 93. Allowance Purse 18800. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 22 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races For $15,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility). (If necessary will be run SAME DISTANCE Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SHOSHA stalked the pace engaging on the backside clearing into the far turn digging in from the rail down the lane having rival measured late. HURRY ON OUT stalked the pace emerging a threat into upper stretch respodning willingly keeping the winner honest. JR'S GIFT slow early would pause along the inside waiting for room on the turn swinging out six wide in upper stretch finishing with interest. PENNY LOAFER unhurried early gave a mild move four wide on the far turn racing evenly down the lane. CHASING A PAYDAY set the early pace being pressed on the backisde ceding into the far turn weakening in upper stretch. MACHO CASH gave a prompted middle move then gave way on the far turn. HAPPY YEARS hustled to stay close would fold on the far turn.

ENTRY.NAME: Chasing a Payday
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, ceded to far turn, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Jr's Gift
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, paused inside far turn, swung 6 wide, finished well

ENTRY.NAME: Hurry On Out
ENTRY.OWNER: Batchelder Stephen H and Jack Ventures LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, emerged upper stretch, vied willingly to wire

ENTRY.NAME: Macho Cash
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Happy Years
ENTRY.OWNER: O'Sullivan Farms LLC and Shaver Stephen
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, folded up on far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Shosha
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, engaged 1/2, cleared far turn, dug in rail, driving

ENTRY.NAME: Penny Loafer
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, hustled outside far turn, finisheed evenly,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 2 1M Turf CR: 86. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 18800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile O r Over Since July 22 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility). (If necessary will be run SAME DISTANCE Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MILLIONDOLARMONKEY saved ground rallying on the far turn angling four wide in upper stretch finding late surge to win clear. LOOPY moved on pace while saving ground clearing on the far turn digging in from the two path down the lane ceding late to outside pressure. HOT HEELS stalked the pace to the far turn saving ground into upper stretch bidding evenly there along the rail. ELIANAGRACE slow early lagged to upper stretch moving up late in the three path. MOONSHINE DREAMER prompted the pace through the backside chasing on the far turn wearing out in upper stretch. ONE NIGHT STAND raced evenly five wide down the backside then faded on the far turn. LILLY CHROME was never involved. TOO CROWDED stalked the pace chasing on the far turn giving way in upper stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Lilly Chrome
ENTRY.COMMENT: never involved

ENTRY.NAME: Loopy
ENTRY.COMMENT: on pace, cleared far turn, dug in two path lane, no match

ENTRY.NAME: Milliondolarmonkey
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground, surged far turn, angled 4 wide lane, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: Elianagrace
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, lagged to lane, moved up late 3 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Hot Heels
ENTRY.OWNER: Quarter Pole Investments LLC and Fletcher Kevin
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, saved ground to lane, bid evenly on rail

ENTRY.NAME: Too Crowded
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, chased far turn, gave way,

ENTRY.NAME: Moonshine Dreamer
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted pace, chased far turn, wore out

ENTRY.NAME: One Night Stand
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly 5 wide, faded far turn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 3 7F Turf CR: 91. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 21200. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $15,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 22 Allowed 3 l bs. Claiming Price $15,000 (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility). (If necessary will be run SIX FURLONGS Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ATTA BOY ANTHONY slow early gave a mild on the far turn angling out to mid track in upper stretch surging late getting up gamely. DARK OAK tracked the pace cutting the corner to vie in upper stretch leading late along the rail being grabbed in the finals yards. SAVVY LAYLA well back to the far turn swung out into upper stretch firing in mid stretch coming with a rush six wide. FEDERALE stalked the pace pressing to upper stretch dueling there coming up a bit short. BUTTON BOX sent clear set the pace through the far turn being hooked between horses in upper stretch weakening late. HOUSEBUILDER tracked evenly to the far turn then weakened into upper stretch. SHINING THROUGH was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Button Box
ENTRY.COMMENT: sent clear, set pace, hooked between lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Dark Oak
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked pace, vied on rail to lane, led late, grabbed last yards

ENTRY.NAME: Atta Boy Anthony
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, mild rally far turn, angled out, surged up

ENTRY.NAME: Shining Through
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Federale
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, pressed to lane, dueled late, bid short

ENTRY.NAME: Savvy Layla
ENTRY.COMMENT: well back swung out to lane, came with a rush 6 wide,

ENTRY.NAME: Housebuilder
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked evenly, weakened,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 4 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 66. Maiden Special Weight Purse 16500. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISS JOANNIE pressed the pace letting a rushing rival go by ob the turn surging past said foe in upper stretch angling in while drawing off. BETHPAGE chased the pace through the turn vying in the four path down the lane responding late a clear second best. FIRST TIME PLAYER pressed early then dropped off on the turn regrouping somewhat from the rail down the lane to best the others. RHYTHM FOREVER chased the early pace weakening at mid track in upper stretch. TEAM FEISTY leapt as the gate opened missing the break, rushed hard after cleared on the turn then wilted in upper stretch. ORDERLY TRANSITION (GB) a step slow early would tire.

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Joannie
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, surged clear top lane, drew off inside

ENTRY.NAME: Team Feisty
ENTRY.COMMENT: leapt missing the break, rushed to contention, led turn flattened

ENTRY.NAME: First Time Player
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed early, dropped off turn, outbid others on rail

ENTRY.NAME: Orderly Transition (GB)
ENTRY.COMMENT: step slow early, tired,

ENTRY.NAME: Rhythm Forever
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, weakened mid track

ENTRY.NAME: Bethpage
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, 4 wide lane, cleared for place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 77. Claiming Purse 8700. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE FEBRUARY 22, 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since July 22 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ARAZI LIKE MOVE vied on the turn wresting the lead three deep in upper stretch drawing clear late. PRETTY STORMY pressed the pace through the turn dueling in upper stretch proving no match for wide rival staying after it late to save place. QUICK ENTRY set the pace through the turn ceding between horses in upper stretch weakening late. RULING EMPIRE chased the pace through the turn weakening in upper stretch finishing evenly on the rail. THE FILTER slow early played no factor. COLONEL MIKE was always outrun. ROYAL SQUEEZE bumped hard leaving the gate chased wide through the turn fading in upper stretch. BALTIC FLEET flashed early speed then faded on the turn.

ENTRY.NAME: The Filter
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, played no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Colonel Mike
ENTRY.COMMENT: always outrun,

ENTRY.NAME: Arazi Like Move
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied on turn, led three deep lane, drew clear,

ENTRY.NAME: Baltic Fleet
ENTRY.COMMENT: flashed speed, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Quick Entry
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pace, ceded between upper stretch, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Ruling Empire
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, weakened inside lane, finished evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Royal Squeeze
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped hard break, wide

ENTRY.NAME: Pretty Stormy
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, dueled to lane, no match late, saved place

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 83. Claiming Purse 8300. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE AUGUST 22, 2022 OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since July 22 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FIRST HOMESTEAD hustled out was measured on pace to the far turn digging in between horses in upper stretch finding more to widen late in the two path. DYNAFORM tracked evenly cutting the corner to threaten in upper stretch being turned away by the winner needing all to save place at the rail. LEMON BLITZ slow early surged to contention on the far turn looming in the four path upper stretch extending the final eighth hanging late. ONLYATTHESHOE slow early rallied to bid on the far turn chasing from mid track down the lane lacking a late surge. GAGE HAS A GRAY stalked the pace chasing through the far turn into upper stretch tiring late. STRAUS'S PLACE in a bit close at the break played no factor. FARTLEK chased early then gave way abruptly on the far turn. READY TO PLAY struggled far back.

ENTRY.NAME: Gage Has a Gray
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, chased far turn, weakened lane

ENTRY.NAME: Fartlek
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early, gave way abruptly far turn

ENTRY.NAME: Lemon Blitz
ENTRY.OWNER: MCM Racing LLC and Jansen Kenny
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, surged far turn, loomed 4 wide lane, hung late

ENTRY.NAME: Ready to Play
ENTRY.COMMENT: struggled far back

ENTRY.NAME: Straus's Place
ENTRY.COMMENT: in close break, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Onlyattheshoe
ENTRY.COMMENT: slow early, rallied far turn, bid 5 wide lane, lacked late respon

ENTRY.NAME: Dynaform
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked evenly, cut corner to lane, vied rail, saved place

ENTRY.NAME: First Homestead
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled out, measured on lead, dug in between, had more

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 88. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 18800. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES OR CLAIMING PRICE $12,500. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile O r Over Since July 22 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $12,500 (Claiming Races For $10,000 Or Less Not Considered In Estimating Allowances)(W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LOST BIKINI gained on the backside drawing even abreast rival on the far turn shaking clear in upper stretch holding firm to wire. MAOILIN raced evenly through the far turn rallying in the four path the final sixteenth saving place. GO STELLAIRE slow early lost ground to upper stretch closing in late six wide. AMAAZA sent clear set the pace through the backside being hooked near the quarter pole ceding in upper stretch fading late near the rail. BRITTLE AND YOO tracked the pace chasing on the far turn wearing down near mid track in upper stretch. LATER DAYS gave early retreat. HONEYBELL was always outrun.

ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, drew even far turn, cleared top lane, held firm

ENTRY.NAME: Maoilin

ENTRY.NAME: Go Stellaire

RACE.RACE_TEXT: MOUNTAINEER RACE TRACK AND RACE 8 5F Dirt CR: 69. Claiming Purse 7900. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE AUGUST 22, 2022. Three Year Olds, 116 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000 (W V A Bred Races Not Considered In Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: I'M A LAWMAN chased early rallying to draw even on the turn dueling abreast foe down the labe prevailing in game fashion. WIZARD WILLIE broke sharply to the early lead was hooked on the turn dueling inside of foe through the lane battling to the end. MY MAE DAY hustled on the outside gained to upper stretch closing the gap late at mid track. SOURNOIS slow ealry raced evenly to upper stretch mustering enough to hold the others. CUSTOM INFINITY raced throughout lacking more. GEMO faded on the turn. OLA QUE TAL was always outrun.

ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharply, set pace, hooked on turn, dueled inside, missed

ENTRY.NAME: Gemo
ENTRY.COMMENT: faded on the turn

ENTRY.COMMENT: chased pace, drew even turn, dueled abreast lane, up gamely,

ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled along, raced evenly, lacked late response,

ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled outside, gained to lane, closed gap late
